summary:
Ciao Everyone!

Thank you for visiting my profile. 
Before you read the details, please let me give you a short summary of myself! 

I am a finance/business controller who originated from Taipei, worked 3 years in the big 4 (EY), passed the CPA exam in the USA(Washington state), studied “EU corporate and commercial law (LLM)” in the UK, now living in the Netherlands, and working for an Italian boss in a Japanese-listed company EMEA HQ.

Wish you a wonderful day! 

Cheers,
Vivian
